events.description: Robert Lewandowski (9) enters the game as a halftime substitution.
Robert Lewandowski (9) makes a run on the left side of the field.
Dante misses a pass, leading to a Bayern Munich attack. Vidal plays the ball into the box towards Thomas Muller.
Robert Lewandowski (9) scores a goal inside the penalty box after a scramble, sending a close range shot into the back of the net.
Bayern players celebrate the goal as the home crowd cheers loudly. Wolfsburg's Dante (#31) shakes his head in disappointment. Pep Guardiola passes on instructions to Boateng.
Götze (#19) receives the ball and performs an exquisite back heel pass to Müller inside the penalty box. Lewandowski (#9) finishes the play with a shot.
Replay of the back heel pass from Götze (#19) to Müller followed by the shot and goal from Lewandowski (#9) in the penalty box.

The Bayern München player shoots the ball towards the goal; VfL Wolfsburg goalkeeper Diego Benaglio dives to his right in an attempt to block the shot, the ball deflects off of Diego Benaglio's hands into the goal.
Replay of the goal from behind the goal with Diego Benaglio (#1) diving, Lewandowski standing near the goal looking for the shot.
Replay of the goal from a front angle view focusing on Lewandowski and the bundesliga replay effect transition.
Robert Lewandowski (#9) from Bayern München shoots the ball from outside of the penalty box into the goal; The goalkeeper is unable to block the shot.
Bayern München coach Pep Guardiola is shown celebrating from the sidelines.
The camera focuses on a player in a white and green jersey.
The crowd cheers and celebrates, their arms raised in the air behind a fence.
Players in red jerseys celebrate, embracing each other closely.
The Bundesliga logo appears on the screen.
Overview of the soccer field, where players from both teams are positioned and preparing for play.
Lewandowski passes the ball down the field, leading to a goal opportunity.
The camera shows the goalkeeper failing to prevent the ball from entering the net.
Goal action, replay of the ball trajectory from the player's perspective.
The camera focuses on a replay of the goal attempt, with the player shooting from the ground to score.

Player #9 from Bayern Munich kicks the ball into the goal from inside the penalty box, with the goalkeeper unable to save it. Players #22 and #4 from the opposing team are nearby, but fail to stop the shot.
Replay of the goal, showing the ball being kicked with power and precision past the goalkeeper. The stadium crowd is visible in the background, celebrating the goal.
The game resumes with Bayern Munich's Player #9 standing near the center circle, ready to restart the match. Several players from both teams are positioned around the field.
The ball is played to Player #10 inside the box, who passes it to Player #23, who then passes it to Player #14 near the center circle.
Player #14 dribbles towards the center circle, then passes the ball to Player #23 who passes back to him, but an opposing player intercepts it.
Player in green jersey is tackled by Player #23 in red jersey, but the tackle is unsuccessful and the ball goes to another Player in red jersey.
Player #23 in red jersey dribbles the ball towards the goal, with a Player in green jersey chasing behind him.
Player #7 in green jersey receives a pass inside the box, then takes a shot, but the goalkeeper saves it and the ball goes out of bounds.
The goalkeeper makes a pass towards Player #27 in red jersey.
